mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders ( car_info_id, order_amount, discount_amount, total_amount, order_completed_date, ownership_type, is_joint_ownership, order_status, user_id, holder_id ) VALUES ( #{carInfoId}, #{orderAmount}, #{discountAmount}, #{totalAmount}, NOW(), #{ownershipType}, #{isJointOwnership}, #{orderStatus}, #{userId}, #{holderId} )
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.order_completed_date, '%Y.%c.%e') AS orderCompletedDate, i.model_name AS modelName, o.total_amount AS totalAmount, d.delivery_status AS deliveryStatus, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(d.delivery_started_at, INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y.%c.%e') AS arrivalDate, DAYNAME(DATE_ADD(d.delivery_started_at, INTERVAL 1 DAY)) AS arrivalDay FROM orders o JOIN information i ON o.car_info_id = i.car_info_id JOIN delivery d ON o.order_id = d.order_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY FIELD(d.delivery_status, '배송준비중', '배송중', '배송완료')
